Name: Echo Tokyo: Phoenix
About the game: Echo Tokyo - The last remnant of humanity exists in this cyber punk city of the future. Take control of the young woman 'Shizume' one of the cities 'Fixers' in the cyber punk city. Trying to survive from one day to the next. Featuring; Decisions that affect how the story unfolds. Dark twists and turns for a varied story arc. Uncover dark and hidden truths of Echo Tokyo.
